xml.data:
Home » 32Kv Kathāvatthupāḷi » 1 Mahāpaṇṇāsaka » 1.1 Paṭhamavagga » 1.1.1 Puggalakathā
1.1.1.11 Lakkhaṇayutti
Mahāpaṇṇāsaka
Paṭhamavagga
Puggalakathā
Lakkhaṇayutti
53.
152๐ Puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Āmantā. Puggalo sappaccayo…pe…  puggalo appaccayo…  puggalo saṅkhato…  puggalo asaṅkhato…  puggalo sassato…  puggalo asassato…  puggalo sanimitto…  puggalo animittoti? Na hevaṃ vattabbe. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
54.
153× Puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Āmantā. Vuttaṃ bhagavatā—  “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti? Āmantā. Puggalo sappaccayo…pe…  puggalo appaccayo…  puggalo saṅkhato…  puggalo asaṅkhato…  puggalo sassato…  puggalo asassato…  puggalo sanimitto…  puggalo animittoti? Na hevaṃ vattabbe. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
154Lakkhaṇayuttikathā.
